text: Tomara yadi mimansa kamana kara, tahale tomadera nikata mimansa pauche geche. Ara yadi tomara pratyabartana kara, tabe ta tomadera jan'ya uttama ebam tomara yadi ta'i kara, tabe ami o temani karaba. Bastutah tomadera kona'i kaje asabe na tomadera dala-bala, ta yata besi'i hoka. Jene rekha allaha rayechena imanadaradera sathe.
